DOC.brief_summary: The studie are to investigate the effect of ultra heat treated (UHT) versus pasteurised milk on bloodlipid profile
DOC.brief_title: Effect of UHT Treated Milk on Blolipid Profile
DOC.criteria: healthy men and women 2250 years of age BMI 2530 non smokers lactose intolerance milk allergy or other types of food allergy Intestinal, abdominal or endocrinnologic diseases daily use of dietary supplements incl. vitamins and minerals cronic diseases (diabetes, CVD etc.) user of medicin on perscription that can influence the resuts of the study allergic to paraamino benzoe acid Physical activity > 10 h pr week Blood donor on a diet or change of dietary habits within 3 months body weigh change > 3 kg within the last 3 month special diets concomitant participation on other studies not able to comply with protocol
